sentences.en: All right, Skull Squadron, jettison Synchro Cannon modules immediately.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 骷髅中队, 立刻抛弃同步炮模块.

sentences.en: Repeat, jettison Synchro Cannon modules immediately.
sentences.cn: 重复, 立刻抛弃同步炮模块.

sentences.en: Should NASA jettison the shuttle and station right away?
sentences.cn: nasa是否现在就该放弃太空梭与太空站的计画 呢 ?

sentences.en: Sometimes you need to jettison unhealthy cargo.
sentences.cn: 有时你必须抛弃不好的货物.

sentences.en: The first place to start may be helping your coworkers jettison unpleasant tasks from their plates.
sentences.cn: 可以从帮助你的同事解决他们不愿意做的难题开始.

sentences.en: We're going to jettison the cargo.

trans.tran_en: to throw things away, especially from a moving plane or ship
